sent.orig: Federal Reserve System includes 12 regional Federal Reserve Banks and 25 Federal Reserve Bank branches.
sent.trans: 联邦储备系统包括12家地区性联邦储备银行和25家联邦储备银行的分行。

sent.orig: The Federal Reserve System includes 12 regional Federal Reserve Banks and 25 Federal Reserve Bank branches.
sent.trans: 联邦储备系统包括１２家地区性联邦储备银行和２５家联邦储备银行的分行。

sent.orig: Union soldiers; Federal forces; a Federal infantryman.
sent.trans: 联军；联合武装；联合步兵。

sent.orig: This week's cut in Federal Fund's federal funds rate was larger than many economists had expected.
sent.trans: 美国联邦基金利率本周的下调幅度远远超出了许多经济学家的预期。

sent.orig: The Federal Act of 1913 gave the Federal Reserve responsibility setting monetary policy.
sent.trans: 1913年的联邦储备法赋予联邦储备系统制定货币政策的责任。
